name: AI Gemini~ OI (G7) - Decontamination Skills and Policy Verification
intro:
Overview of Decontamination Requirements

This questionnaire verifies your understanding of the G7 Decontamination Policy and SOP. It covers operational roles, safety protocols, and the treatment of vulnerable persons during decontamination procedures.

structure.description: According to the policy, who is the agency responsible for the decontamination of the public and personnel at incidents attended by Fire and Emergency New Zealand?
Which of the following are principles of decontamination as defined in the G7 policy? (Select all that apply)
Can Fire and Emergency personnel use force to decontaminate an individual against their will if they believe it is necessary for safety?
What is the minimum flow rate required for emergency decontamination of a person wearing permeable clothing?
Describe the specific restriction regarding Portaflex showers and their use on infants or members of the public.
structure.correctAnswer: Portaflex showers should not be used on members of the public or infants, nor on personnel who are not wearing non-permeable suits and breathing apparatus.

structure.description: Within what timeframe must a Decontamination Officer record exposure to a hazardous substance in Safe@Work?
When decontaminating a child, what steps must firefighters take to ensure protection and professionalism? (Select all that apply)
options: Only undress or wash a child if a parent/caregiver cannot
Ensure the firefighter is never alone with the child in an enclosed space while undressing
Perform decontamination in total isolation to ensure privacy
Report any suspected child abuse observed during the process
correctAnswer: Only undress or wash a child if a parent/caregiver cannot
Ensure the firefighter is never alone with the child in an enclosed space while undressing
Report any suspected child abuse observed during the process

structure.description: Where should the decontamination facility be located in relation to the incident zones?
options: In the middle of the Cold Zone
At the transition from the Hot Zone to the Cold Zone
structure.correctAnswer: At the transition from the Hot Zone to the Cold Zone
